entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High plus 2 except zero inland.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle or flurries early this morning. Periods of rain beginning this morning except freezing rain inland. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this afternoon. High plus 2 except zero inland. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain except freezing rain inland early this evening. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this evening. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Risk of thundershowers in the afternoon. Fog patches developing in the afternoon. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
